title: Firm maximizes profit at 85 units, $10 price

content.question: The firm will maximize profit in the short run if it

choices.label: shuts down and the price is <math alttext="$10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

produces <math alttext="30" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>30</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> units and the price is <math alttext="$4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

produces <math alttext="30" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>30</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> units and the price is <math alttext="$10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

produces <math alttext="54" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>54</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> units and the price is <math alttext="$4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

produces <math alttext="85" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>85</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> units and the price is <math alttext="$10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: produces <math alttext="85" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>85</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> units and the price is <math alttext="$10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 5.3: Profit-Maximizing Behavior in Perfectly Competitive Factor Markets
